modules.description: This module provides functions for testing monoid properties on a given type `A.t`, including associativity, identity, and commutativity. It supports writing unit tests using Alcotest, with helpers to generate test cases and check equality using custom printers. Concrete use cases include validating monoid instances for algebraic structures like integers under addition or lists under concatenation.

This module provides functions for testing equality, pretty-printing, and generating test cases for a given data type `A.t`. It includes operations to check expected versus actual values, create testable values for Alcotest, and run specific tests like verifying inverses or division behavior. Concrete use cases include unit testing algebraic structures such as integers, vectors, or custom arithmetic types.

This module provides functions for defining and running basic tests on values of type `A.t`. It includes operations for pretty-printing, equality checking, and generating test cases for Alcotest. Concrete use cases include testing serialization roundtrips, verifying structural equality, and formatting error messages during test failures.

This module provides functions for defining and running tests on values of type `A.t`. It includes operations for pretty-printing values, creating testable values for use with Alcotest, and checking equality between expected and actual values with a custom error message. It is used to support unit testing of data structures or values encapsulated in the `A` module.

This module provides functions for testing monoid properties on a given type `A.t`, including associativity, commutativity, and identity. It supports generating test cases for monoid operations, with utilities to verify equality, format values, and construct Alcotest-compatible testable values. Concrete use cases include validating monoid instances for custom data types in unit tests.

This module provides functions for defining and running tests on values of type `A.t`, including equality checks, negation and subtraction tests, and test case generation. It supports creating testable values with custom pretty-printing and comparison, specifically for validating arithmetic or algebraic structures. Concrete use cases include testing implementations of mathematical types like integers, vectors, or matrices where equality and operations need strict verification.

This module provides functions for testing semiring properties using randomly generated values, including associativity, distributivity, and multiplicative zero behavior. It works with any type `A.t` that forms a semiring, supporting operations like `mul` and `add`. Concrete use cases include validating algebraic structures in property-based tests and ensuring correctness of numeric or algebraic implementations.

This module provides functions for defining and running tests on algebraic structures like monoids, groups, semirings, and fields. It includes operations for generating test cases, checking equality, and verifying algebraic properties such as associativity, identity, and distributivity, using custom printers and Alcotest-compatible testable values. Concrete use cases include validating implementations of mathematical types like integers, vectors, or matrices in unit and property-based tests.

This module defines and runs tests for algebraic structures by generating test cases, checking equality, and verifying properties like associativity and distributivity. It works with custom data types and Alcotest-compatible testable values to validate mathematical implementations such as integers, vectors, and matrices. Use it to write unit and property-based tests that ensure correctness of algebraic operations in specific domains.
